originalText.text: I have being dealing with Life Pharmacy for abt 6yrs the staff is wonderful always get my medication delivered on time. Chantel is a  beautiful staff that work very good with you Thank you

originalText.text: I always get all the products here and the staff is very helpful. The best pharmacy in nyc

originalText.text: I've been going to Life pharmacy for years . I can honestly say unlike those big name chain pharmacies. Life pharmacy makes sure you get the best medical advice , care & attention. The one & only time there was a lil hiccup. It was resolved with no problems. The staff is great , their like extended family. I can always count on them . Unlike those big name chains they don't take the time or put in the loyalty. That is necessary when working with people. I'm going to continue & stay with Life pharmacy. I'm also going to strongly suggest that people stop by . Say hello & say goodbye to those big chain pharmacies. I'd rather have someone I know has & will make time for me. As opposed to being part of a chain that really doesn't have a care in the matter of my needs to the point of frustration . Yes! I'm speaking from experience & that's why I give Life Pharmacy 5 stars.

originalText.text: Hi Guys! This is Leticia I got to Brooklyn & didn't check my bag . I just count my prescription sheets & it wasn't until I went to take my Meds & put them away . That's when I realized I didn't get my ambien, however I have the prescription sheet for it . I called but I didn't get any answer nor did I get the voicemail. Please give me a call when you receive this review. B/c I trust it had to be an honest error. Something you guys don't ever do , but hey we're humans. I'm sure this is nothing for me to stress about . B/c you guys take care of me & everyone I've seen come in always leaves satisfied. I'll give you a call 1st thing Monday.
